short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create customized boilerplates for kickstarting your development!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of always having to rewrite all the code for your new extension? This extension literally generates other extensions tailored for your specific needs! Try it now!
